fullText: Jeremy Piven brings his trademark rapid-fire delivery and manic energy to Bobby Gould in this slick revival of David Mamet's Hollywood satire. While the production moves at a brisk clip, it lacks the deeper bite that makes Mamet's insider commentary truly sting.
